caption.p: Photos of Malaysian herbal plants with therapeutic potential for sepsis: (a) whole plant of Andrographis paniculata; (b) rhizome of Zingiber officinale; (c) rhizome of Curcuma longa; (d) Piper nigrum berries; (e) dried flower buds of Syzygium aromaticum; (f) fruits of Momordica charantia; and (g) whole plant of Centella asiatica. GLOB inMED, https://www.globinmed.com/index.php?option=com_content&view=category&id=209&Itemid=143 (accessed 4 March 2020).
